value:
He may not be the greatest dancer,
but his effort is worthy of praise.
So long as it doesn't go to his head...

Quan was fond of my ensemble, but
I would like an unbiased perspective.
Do you think it suits me?

A dance has more in common with a
battle than it may seem at a glance.
Keep your wits about you.

You are far too tense—just like my
husband. Here, have a drink. Take a
moment to collect yourself.

I am not a particularly gifted dancer,
but for my dear Quan...I will act the
part of elegance, at least.

My name is Ethlyn. I would like to
invite you to the dance, on behalf
of $Nf.

A most satisfactory performance,
if I do say so myself.

Not bad. But I still have room to
improve, wouldn't you say?

Perhaps I should take a step back
from the action...if only for today.

For me? Hehe... Quan is sure
to envy me this. Thank you!

My name is Ethlyn. My husband,
Quan, and I both look forward to
enjoying this evening's festivities.

Phew! Dancing certainly does take
its toll. Join me for a little rest?$k$pI am not overly fond of this sort of
pageantry, if I'm honest. But I do see
the need for it.$k$pFestivals of this kind afford people
opportunities to bond that they may
not otherwise have.$k$pMy husband, for instance, would like
to be anywhere other than here. But
it is good for him, nevertheless.$k$pThat is why I have decided to enjoy
this as much as I can. Shall we get
back to it, $Nu?
はいっ
That's enough
ああっ
My feet...
Care to dance?
To the dance floor!
Like this! ...Right?
I'll lead!
One more dance...
Hehe...
Please. Allow me.
Steady now.
When I was a girl, my father worried I was too much of a tomboy.
It is expected that all members of House Chalphy receive dance training. Of course, so did I.
Quan's touch is so gentle. Following his lead feels like second nature.
Altena, Leif... What dance partners will your futures hold, I wonder...
This dance festival is a delight. Thank you for letting me join you.
Another song!
A twirl and a step?
The steps are clear.
